headline.main: News Summary and Index; The Major Events of the Day International National Metropolitan The Other News Quotation of the Day CORRECTION

docs.abstract: article corrects earlier story which held that majority view among members of scientific community was that repts of UFOs should be taken seriously; says such point of view is held by minority within scientific community
docs.lead_paragraph: The Soviet Union has begun high-level efforts to persuade Egypt and Syria to move toward a diplomatic settlement of the Middle East conflict, according to diplomats in Cairo. Moscow is reportedly arguing that Egyptian advances in the Sinai and losses inflicted on Israel by Syria have sufficiently changed the military balance to make a favorable diplomatic settlement possible. [Page 1, Column 8.]
